content:
Posted: April 8, 2016
Early Access Review
								My 30 minutes of playtime for this game was pretty bad.-First, you spawn in the middle of nowhere, with no tutorial, no basic supplies, no direction whatsoever with what you are ACTUALLY supposed to be doing with your life. -Within the first 5 minutes my character was already dying of thirst and starvation, with no food or water in sight. -If you have a confrontation with a.. wild dog, wolf, whatever it is, good luck. Especially since you can't even punch the darn thing since the only thing you can use are weapons, which are few far and in between. -I actually found the help menu, which shows what buttons to push to do what, but had to exit the game to actually find it. No in game help menu at all. -The inventory menu is complicated to use. Not to mention you only have 6 free slots to stash stuff. -The combat is choppy and just plain bad. -You run across more ammo than you do guns(should be the other way around)-When you actually do come across a gun, you can't tell if you have the right ammo for it anyways since none of it is written in english. Morale of the story, don't buy this game. It has potential, but unless they make some MAJOR changes, it would be the worst $5 I've ever spent.

								Unfortunately I'm not reccomending this game, though here's my review.Pros:Price $5 can't beat itSmooth gameplayCustomization is a plusMaps are easy to understandPossibly more good updates to comeCons:Much lag on almost every serverInability to find matching loot in some towns for weaponry, orjust the inability to know what bullets match what gun.Unable to see amount of ammunition in current weapon (that i know of)No guidance what so ever on craftingSmall maps make for almost no loot (or the loot is based upon whoever is looting as I've learned my friend can't see the gear I see so possibility that loot is clientsided unless dropped by a player.Unfriendly community as expected from a pvp game so that's sort of a pro makes it PVP friendly.Survival threats are very low, cold, food, water, wolfs /dogs and players. Perfect game, it's not bad just needs work (alot).

content:
Posted: August 16, 2015
Early Access Review
								Deutsche Version-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ich habe Postapocalypse now Beta grade angetestet und muss sagen das ich von dem Spiel schon ein wenig angetan bin. Ein Let's Test mit ein paar Fights findet Ihr hier:


YouTube™ Video: Lets Play Postapocalypse now Beta Deutsch / German - Großes Gefecht[1] 

			Views: 2,105		

			Link to the full Let's Play: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL6UcsnchIWZWvk3lINNsJDR2UQN82_6d8 Link zum Let's Play: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL6UcsnchIWZWvk3lINNsJDR2UQN82_6d8...		

Aber erstmal was zum Gameplay, also ich habe alle bekannteren Survival-Games momentan installiert und muss sagen das es PA Now geschafft hat sich seinen eigenen Platz zu erkämpfen. Es fühlt sich ein wenig an wie eine Mischung aus Seven Days to Die und H1Z1 mit dem unterschied das man das Gefühl hat, ich laufe nicht ewig bis etwas passiert sondern es geht von der ersten Sekunde an richtig los. Okay die Grafik ist halt nicht mit DAYZ vergleichbar und oft wirkt das Spiel noch unfertig, aber man darf nicht vergessen das es eine Beta ist und das sich bis zum fertigen Spiel noch einiges ändern kann. Ich für meinen Teil finde es sind die 5€ Wert, schnell auf einen Server ein bisschen über Loot freuen ein bisschen Ballern und dann auf den nächsten Patch warten, dass is Postapocalypse "NOW" -> Ich hoffe es entwickelt sich zu einem Postapocalypse "WOW".English Version-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I have now Postapocalypse beta being tested and must say that I am pleased with the game a bit.A Let's test with a couple of fights can be found here:


YouTube™ Video: Lets Play Postapocalypse now Beta Deutsch / German - Großes Gefecht[1]

But first something about the gameplay, so I have all known Survival Games currently installed and must say that has managed PA Now to fight for his own place. It feels a bit like a mixture of Seven Days to Die and H1Z1 with the difference that you feel, I do not run forever until something happens but it comes from the first second to get going. Okay, the graphics are just not comparable with DAYZ and often affects the game still unfinished, but one must not forget that it is a beta, and that can change a lot up to the finished game yet. I think for my part for 5 €, go quickly on a server fight a bit, Loot what you can and wait for the next patch that is Postapocalypse "NOW" -> I hope it develops into a Postapocalypse "WOW".

content:
Posted: May 27, 2015
Early Access Review
								Horrible. Absolutely horrible. It's like it was made by someone in high school over the course of a week. It's grotesquely ugly, sound effects are♥♥♥♥♥♥ even if you're crawling you still emit the same loud footsteps as if you're walking, the only difference is that they come with bigger intervals. I looked at the reviews and went "Oh cool, this doesn't seem very generic at all besides the player base." And boy, was I wrong. Literally everyone I met killed me on sight and the ones who didn't manage to kill me only didn't because I ran for my life. I never found more than 2 pistols in my whole playthrough, barely any melee weapons, no real supplies and scarce food. Most houses I visited were looted and the houses are very repetitive. The map feels like it's 100 meters across or something, the graphics, once again, are UTTERLY CRAP, all text in the game is just plan white arial in all-caps, the icons look like they're made in paint and then scaled up to the point of blurriness, when you die you can see all players on the map and where they are, everyone shoots each other on sight and for some reason there are dogs in the game that you can outrun extremely easily. I regret so much buying this, that's 5€ I could have done something useful for. The mere thought of launching this game depresses me. Please, please, please do not buy this until it becomes a GAME and not just a 5 minute Unity project for a class in high school which is exactly what it feels like.

content:
Posted: May 21, 2015
Early Access Review
								Well...You basically spend five bucks to play a loot simulator and wolf hunting simulator and by the time you find any players, A. You dump every round you have into them just to be one tapped or, B. They kill you easily and speak Russian slurs to your corpse. Here is where the PVP leaves you bent over a table with a gag in your mouth. The report button you are given as you die is a for sure way to make sure you ban that kid that killed you or vise versa. So if I was you I would stick to killing wolves and gathering supply as killing will get you a for sure ban as the kid that you've just managed to kill is surely butt hurt and will report you. But seriously not a horrible start to a decent game has lots of potential to be the next big survival game, but as of now is (***IN-MY-OPINION***) a waste of five dollars.EDIT: And not to mention the fact that you can spectate every living player in the minute it takes to respawn so you campers and base builders and people seaking survival are all being watched, so removing the report button and option to spectate everyone would be a great start to building a stronger game.FEELINGS: Mixed

number of helpful: 0 of 2 people (0%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: June 2, 2015
Early Access Review
								My review:Playing only close to 2 hours of this game I have experienced more bugs than in my 500 hours on Infestation Survivor stories game time. This game is also not a poor mans DayZ. It has barely a quarter of content compared to DayZ. If you want a cheap version of DayZ simply go to the free to play tab on steam and download Unturned which is better in every way.Good points:- Easy to run and max out on any computer made in the last 10 years. (Could be due to the terrible texture quality in buildings and the fact that the game world is broke into different parts)- PVP is okay. (Worse than DayZ and ISS due to the terrible amount of motion blur when shot at.)- Interesting looting system. (mainly finding loot by opening different doors and cases.)Bad Points:- There is currently only 3 enemies in the game. (Wolves, Bears and other players)- The game has a terrible spawn system. (I spawned ontop of a wolf and took instant damage. I have also spawned into enemy territory in TDM)- Inventory system is awful and clunky.- You spawn with nothing to defend yourself including being unable to punch.- Wolves can noclip into buildings and are able to fly through doors.- Bears can instantly kill you.- Ragdoll system is bad, characters arms and legs seem to have no bones and clip through buildings.- There is no custom options at the main menu meaning you are not only unable to adjust graphics quality but also sound and key bindings.- The game also seems to ban people that have just brought the game for no reason. ( I heard that it bans US players)- The game has a capped FOV of maybe 60 give or take. You can not adjust this in the launcher.- You will be instantly disconnected if you press ESC meaning not only is it annoying but also people can log out in combat.- Hitboxes and weapon dmg is awful( I point blanked someone with a colt 1911 in the head and then repeatedly shot them in the body as they ran away. They lived. Blood was coming out of them too.)- Guns are completely unbalanced and are unreliable( I was 1 shotted across the street by a guy with a double barrel. Yet with the same gun It took me atleast 4 or 5 rounds to kill someone point blank with the same gun in a perfect condition.)

Early Access Review
								Well...You basically spend five bucks to play a loot simulator and wolf hunting simulator and by the time you find any players, A. You dump every round you have into them just to be one tapped or, B. They kill you easily and speak Russian slurs to your corpse. Here is where the PVP leaves you bent over a table with a gag in your mouth. The report button you are given as you die is a for sure way to make sure you ban that kid that killed you or vise versa. So if I was you I would stick to killing wolves and gathering supply as killing will get you a for sure ban as the kid that you've just managed to kill is surely butt hurt and will report you. But seriously not a horrible start to a decent game has lots of potential to be the next big survival game, but as of now is (***IN-MY-OPINION***) a waste of five dollars.EDIT: And not to mention the fact that you can spectate every living player in the minute it takes to respawn so you campers and base builders and people seaking survival are all being watched, so removing the report button and option to spectate everyone would be a great start to building a stronger game.FEELINGS: Mixed

content:

Early Access Review
								暂时玩了半小时，发现画面竟然能媲美DAYZ和H1Z1，甚至某些方面比这两个万年（将来）A测的游戏还好。首先优化好，配置平民，服务器质量高，最重要的是游戏只需5刀！！！实际上，系统和游戏内容都已经超过这5刀的价格了。有建造系统，Loot木系统，还有必备的PVP系统，武器很丰富，载具也没的说，那剩下还有什么能说的呢……不过跟DAYZ和H1Z1来比的话，这个游戏更倾向于生存而不是打丧尸，因为丧尸真的很少很少!最后，为作者的更新速度点个赞。

content:
Posted: February 3, 2016
Early Access Review
								EDIT: On 5th of April 2016 I decided to give this game another try, so I re-downloaded it and re-installed. And it actually worked a lot better. I could explore the world, wander about, find some nice equipment (hatchet, two types of gun) and even some tiny food rations. I even found like 5 dogs, who all died to my hatchet. But I could not find anything to drink at all, after searching like 15+ houses, some quite big houses (a school, a church, a saw mill). And only two pieces of food (one box of sardines and one chocolat). So I eventually starved / dehydrated. Not much to do yet, it seems. Game lagged a little at times, and maybe 15 times I experienced a nasty "teleport" bug - walking on the road or next to a house, and then instantly re-appearing somewhere else where I was like 3-5 minutes ago. It felt like that movie "The Ground-Hog Day", or maybe like a "Goldfish-memory Simulator 2016". And then I experienced a major crash bug that made my computer freeze so much it needed a restart. So I would not change my recommendation to a recommend yet, since it is quite buggy and not fun nor good enough to play for more than say 30-45 minutes yet, but it is improving. So given some more series of improvements, it may soon be worth a try as a game. Original review: Stay away from this one. Buggy, laggy, not working properly in My computer.

content:
Posted: November 22, 2015
Early Access Review
								( If you are deciding to buy then read this ) First of all get the game if you like russians,big firefights, and mass murder by wolves and tractors. Game is fun, but from my experience it is also posessed by a ghost.  At first the game seems small but there are actually many maps.  Me and my friend were traveling from map to map finding many things, and doing well.  We eventually came to a point were we were scarce of food and water.  We decided to shoot eachother with our guns to end the misery, but we searched around a little more to see if there was hope left.  Btw, we were at a point were we saw no players. We eventually found a crashed plane and we deicde to search it. The dark travel screen came up that you get when you travel from map to map.  Me and my friend were quickly horrified as we enetered the area the plane seemed to turn into  a dark underground vault, where it was very creepy, it was like nothing else in the game.  Me and my friend were confused and scared so we exited the area and reneted.  On the second time we entered we found a man who was not there standingf there before, we shot him.  We exited again and went back in for the third time.  I quickly realised something was wrong as my friend was there a second ago, but now he wasnt.  We talked over skype about what was happeneing.  While i roamed the creepy room all of  a sudden in a blink of an eye i was in another room.  This room was creepy and dark and the floor was filled a ft. high with water.  What made the experience worse was i wasnt  alone in this new room, the same man we shot before was in the room was there too, so i bolted int a big room in the middle and ran into some sort of closet and hid. I then died of freezing to death and lost all my stuff including my gas mask,rifle,shot gun, and all my cool clothes.  While i was waiting to respawn, i saw the water splash next to my dead body, as i respawn i was scared to find my slef spawn in the dark water room again.  I quit scared out of my mind.  My friend died in the other dark room but trace back to his dead body.  i hope this was just a glitch because now im stuck in a dark room forever with a ghost.10/10 would play crapping myself at 3:00 in the morning simulator again.All in all the game has its fun moments, but  can the game creators respond and tell me if the "water" room is supposed to be there. Day 1:I manned up and searched the water room.  It is literally the maze of hell.  I am stuck wandering the maze.  Pls send more russians with shotguns for backup. Day 2: I heard breathing, i got paranoid but it was my own...few.Day 3: I am currently going to keep writing logs until im saved, if you buy this, search for the crashed airline plane and help.Btw these arent actually days these are really just minutes.Day 4: I found an elevator! Im saved thank god!  But still, something was down there with me...But yay im out

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: August 4, 2015
Early Access Review
								This game is kinda like dating a fat chick...you're having an o.k time,you know you can do better,and you may or may not tell your friends about it....I'll start off by saying thi title isnt "bad" however at first part of me felt like I wasted 6 bucks that  I could have blown on something more useful, perhaps a roach catcher or pet rock?The damn dogs will follow you to ♥♥♥♥ing middle earth, and back again!I get that in real life dogs are pretty great hunters but when you make the playable character unable to punch,kick,headbutt or even urinate in fear without a melee weapon, the fight is EXTREMELY one sided...Another thing that grinds my metaphorical gears,is for the last 15 mintes prior to writing this review my character kept repeatedly declaring "♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ i'm hungry and "damn i'm thirsty" all the while running from 3 super dogs who never ran out of staminia.Other new found grievences are a few of the bloodthirsty Russians who with a well constructed group effort decided to repeatdly kill me,teabag my corps and would go hide in the factory and soak in a kiddy pool of vodka while they prepare for their next ambush...lolI do not understand the construct of this mentality for these types of games,I understand fully it's a "survival" game but what fun is it to just murder people and pay special attention to the newbies as it not only stifles the community but let's face it I wish the ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥gary would just stay on the DAYZ servers...The store page mentioned LOADS of vehicles and guns and clothing...So far ive found a chocolate bar,a torch,2 handguns, pants that look like they were dropped by Lady GAGA,and a flamboyant high collar shirt so my character looked more like he was going to break out in song and dance than kill you,,,I must admit though I am excited about finding a helicopter and some sweet weaponry.Don't get me wrong,I really think this game has some awesome potential and it has a few pockets of awesomeness waiting to be tapped into. WIth a little more work and refining I truly believe these game can do something great and present it it a more simplistic affordable way.A few things in my humble opinion that I hope the creators will see:* refining the dogs A.I (Love the idea when it comes to making this game more "survival" but either redo the A.I or make a Michael Vick NPC to control how many dogs are roaming out there..)*I feel the same way about the bears,as the dogs...(redo the A.I or add a bear whisperer skill) lol*ADD MORE GUNS and when your done.....ADD MORE!  :)* Consider a way to bring more balance among players.. (base building,Tribes/Guild whatever you want to call it, but make an inscentive for people to work together some rather than everyone and everything is your enemy)*Incorperate more customization and a more intuitive tutorial/help screen ( this games controls are straight forward but a little more of an in depth guide (in game) would be nice.* MELEE! any unarmed defense  (The force,Fistycuffs,karate chops,hell kicks) it doesn't matter...im just tired of being mauld by the viscious wildlife and going down without a fight.I really appreciate what you all are doing, its easy for me to sit here and pick the game apart but I can't imagine what goes into something like this and for you all to make it affordable during its production..I want to get people onboard in spite of my levity in my review I CAN SEE THE POTENTIAL! KEEP IT UP!Thanks for reading and until next time,ive got a score to settle with scooby and his little mutt friends!-Shaddock

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 15, 2015
Early Access Review
								Don't buy at this stage unless its under $10.00 , whilst fun it feels unfinished and unbalanced, however given this is early build its understandable.Pros :- Mostly complete game- Weapons are as expected in real life ( no head shot no damage RNG BS ) - Controls are fairly easy to use - Somewhat fun Cons : - You start the game unarmed, and you don't know how to punch or kick- Due to the above advanced players will camp your spawn points, as its safer to kill you than other well setup players- Nothing is explained before starting the game - Very easy to die of thirst, except its not logical, see empty bottles lying around, can you refill it ? , nope, drink a plastic bottle of water and the bottle vanishes- My system is fine , but it could chug on some machines- Not sure if everyone has this but my game had missing options from start menuMy review could change out of early testing , but at this stage stay away unless your wanting to put up with a fair amount of spawn killing and no real objective other than " collect crap kill players "

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: October 12, 2015
Early Access Review
								With this new update they have recently release, I have decided to update my review on Survival: Postapocalypse Now.Now as I start out my review, this is my personal opinion on the game I know the game isn't great and yes it is in Early Access.Pros:-Has some interesting features I have not seen in other survival games.-Has some decent combat (not the best)-There are no generic zombies.-The starting zone in the jail is a really good idea I think, it is pretty creative and I have not seen this in any other of the survival games I have played.-Look at the cute ban screen :)Cons:-The Graphics are not the best, But they are alright and bearable.-The Game is unoptimized and you are garunteed fps drops while playing this game.- The wolves/dogs are not the best and have some issues about them, like walking through walls continue walking after death.-I have had alot of issues with the temperature in this game and find myself dying of cold no matter what.-Some items are not in english, this is an okay thing since the game is made by russains so if they haven't fully translated stuff thats cool there is probably also mods to fix thisOverall: 7.5/10Note: There is other survival games worth off gettings, but this game does not require much to run and does have the potential to become alot better.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: October 7, 2015
Early Access Review
								Survival: Postapocalypse Now is an early acces Alpha FPS survival game, it has no campaign but a funny, adventurous and sometimes exciting multiplayer-survaval game mode. Although it costs us a little, as far as I'm concerned, it is not too much for the content of the game. In addition to in-game features, sometimes players will have to face challenges from the environment itself and other players, prudence will be your key and best friend to survive with.In this game, you will find more developped materials, resources and weapons by moving further and further away, you can still stay where you were when you have spawned, but my suggestion will be to advance, get fully equipped and packed with enough food and other raw materials. In this game, you can even make a helicopter fly or driving cars and jeeps.I also strongly recommend you to play this game with friends, it will be really funny and interesting to play with more players than just alone. It will be much easier to survive since you find different materials in different places, for example: you might find an AK-47 on a table while your teamnate can see just a bottle of water on the same table. You will get more chance to find rare items and will find it easier to survive. You can also kill the players then grab their items, which is more easily than gather them slowly but surely.P.S: there are no zombies in this game, so if you get into a dark area you don't need to be afraid.^^Positive remarks+ multiplayer mode+ very interesting and funny to play with friends+ difficulty improved each time you go towards a new map+ challenging to survive with some enemy players+ wide range of weapons and resources+ only 2 kinds of animals will attack you: wolves(dogs?) and bears+ new ways to survive ( cooking )+ vehicles + dynamite+ quick updates from the GM+ different features and functions on clothesNegative remarks- sometimes severe bugs will occur (ex: you spawn on the sky and die by falling on the ground)- animals (that are offensive) spawn always at the same place, less challenging- only a few maps to discover- hackers- temperature issues for survival decreases a little bit too quickly- at first, players spawn in a prison and can die right away if you don't get out quickly enough, especially to beginners- weapon switching system is a bit strange

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: February 7, 2016
Early Access Review
								This game needs a lot of improvement. But, It does have some Pros.Pros:Pretty good way of actually starting your survival. (Trying to escape the prison you woke up in)Pretty cheap survival game.Somewhat realistic.Weather can actually kill you.No hackers. (YET)Now... lets go to the cons.Cons:Grahpics are a little bad.You can't even change grahpic settings nor any settings.No way of typing so people without mics can really communicate.Teleports. (You can walk to a certain area and get teleported to another part of a map, I think thats a little annoying, making the map bigger to make that all fit would be good and much better)Crafting is a little annoying to use.Wolves and bears spawn the exact same place everytime.You spawn with your stuff from another server.No way to make your own server.Crouching makes you go through this procces; Crouch then Prone then stand back up. You can just go back to standing.You can fall from 2 feet and get injured.The community is already going bad. (People are just killing on sight and people are just roasting each other)Base building is really that good. (People are just building in already generated buildings and they claim it as their own)The only people I ever saw playing this game were Russians. You already know what Russians do in CS:GO.... Don't need to explain.If you want to play a cheap survival game when you are bored this is the game. I don't recommend putting hours and hours of gameplay on this because this game isn't finished and you'll probably die by falling or a Russian on the server killing you.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: September 6, 2015
Early Access Review
								2016 full review edit / change to not recommended...: I can't recommend this game anymore. It's very glitchy, no one plays anymore (30 people across multiple servers, if that.) and the devs have abandoned the game to work on their next project. Postapocalypse Now: War. Here's just a few glitches / annoyances.Animals (bears, wolves) spotting you from half way across the map.Animals never ceasing to stop chasing you. If you somehow break their pathing (climb on a ladder, close a door) they will sit there and wait for you forever.Weapons are always unloaded. No ammo, no clips or magazines, nothing. Finding guns is arguable the most common. Finding literally anything useful is a test of patience.You're constantly freezing to death. To stay warm you need an axe to cut down a tree and get wood, fuel to soak the wood and a lighter to burn it. That wouldn't be so bad if you weren't CONSTANTLY. FREEZING. TO DEATH.You start out at about 37 or so degrees celcius. Celcius. That's 98.6 degrees fahrenheit.You will freeze to death and die at about 25 celcius. THAT'S  77 DEGREES FAHRENHEIT. YOU DIE AT ROOM TEMPERATURE. IN THE MIDDLE OF SIBERIA. NAKED.This upsets me the most, because food and water are managable, but god help you if you don't find the tools for a fire. R.I.P. Dmitry. Got slightly too cool and died.You're completely defenseless most of the time. You find a gun? Good for you, it will never have ammo and good luck finding any. Pray you find a melee weapon.Their newest "alpha" version of the game is literally an unplayable mess, it was somehow more broken than their older version. Like, broken to the point where your mouse didn't work when you tried to play it.It had a lot of squandered potential, and it was actually a lot of fun when hundreds of people played, devs were still working on the game and you had someone to play with despite it being glitchy. The last "update" was in March, with the ungodly terrible alpha update.Don't buy this game, it doesn't seem to be getting any better from here.

Early Access Review
								My old review:"Pros:-you are starting as russian football hooligan escaping from prison-atmosphere-price-pretty fun if you are playing with friends-a lot of items-uhmmmm... sounds?-scavenging-scavenging-even more scavenging-vehicles-no zombies-regular updates-system requirements (probably you can launch this game on your chair)-you never know where are other players, and you have to be really carefull-bears roar is f****** scary-big locations-ACHIEVEMENT IS NOT A LIE ANYMORE!-graphics can look good...Cons:-...but sometimes it's ugly as Trump's haircut-death out of nowhere-who cares about tutorial?-terrible models and ragdoll-russians, why are you ruining every game?-bugs-more bugs-"open" world-music is unnecessary-awkward weapon changing-you have to drink and eat A LOT to stay alive (character should be obese)-small problems with inventory-achievements are in russian :I 6+/10 - objectively7+/10 - subjectively (because I just can't stop playing) :3"BUT something went wrong...First of all, developers don't give a sh** about this game anymore. Why? They made playable "beta" version which I played for about 20 hours. But then they probably thought "Hey, lets make new version of this game with better graphics and other improvements". And you know what? They f****d up. New "alpha" is terrible, full of bugs, containing 3-4 maps full of emptiness, bugged wolves/dogs, and objects with boring, grey-brown textures. They added achievements! In russian of course... Now here's the crazy thing right now.They added new game on Steam Greenlight. Which looks like this game. Why...? Dear developers - finish this game before making new one.You made playable, pretty nice game in "beta" (old survival), so why can't you continue making it? Old Survival - 6+/10New alpha - f****g 3/10

content:
Posted: May 22, 2016
Early Access Review
								I wish there was a mixed button but there isn't soo...I started playin' survival back in 2015 with my best friend the game was available on facebook, you could buy kits that would vary from 0,20€  to 2€ wich is pretty much the same in dollars.The game was really fun, it was more focused on combat and pvp pretty much with no survival aspect, it had alot a hackers but they weren't a big threat. there were some bugs here and there but nothing special. And about the microtransactions, it was really easy to find weapons so the players that spent money in the game wouldn't have advantages. It's 2016, I have more than a 1000 hours in the game.Finnaly the steam version launched and we didn't really care.Soem onths later we decided to go to steam and see what's new about the steam version we looked at the community hub and there was a bunch of cool vehicles and etc, and we thought that the game was really cool so we decided to buy it.First day of playing the game, me and my friend took 1 hour and 30 minutes to find each other, then another hour goes by and we find one player who had a shotgun, we tried to communicate with him and he started shooting us, he missed all the shots and i shot him one time in the head i killed him, pretty use kill, i was already used to shooting in survival.So now i have 13hours of gameplay and i gotta say,the game has a LOT of potential but, right there's alot of bugs and gamebreaking problems, almost nobody playing and I  can understand why.So i recommend you to play the facebook version instead, you'll have alot more fun.If you have 5 bux to spare and want to support the devs it's your choice.I keep looking forward to this game, and i hope this review helps.

								           So far I've only played this game for 2 hrs, but it was definitly one of the most intresting expirences I've had. First I spawn shirtless like any normal russian would (right?) near some shack, so I seach around until a dog scares the sh*t out of me and I run for about five minutes until I meet my first fellow player. He was dressed in green and armed with a shotgun so I decide to stay back and watch due to me being KOS'ed countless times in other games like it, he leaves and I find an ugly blue sweater, my first loot item and it probably saved others from being stabbed by my undoubtly pointy nips. It's been about an hour and I also just found a 357 and 5 bullets for it too, a few minutes later a innocent looking shirtless man just charges at me with an axe and I nervously spray bullets all over the place and lucky he gets hit by one or two and it kills him. So, as I strut off like a bad*ss Clint Eastwood I hear barking it's about 5 wolves coming for me I some how manage to slay all of them with an axe and limp away, I hide in a factory building and just as I turn around another corner to see one more I get bit and die. I'm not angry in fact I'm almost in tears from laughter that I survived off of luck for so long survived a godamn axe attack! Just to be murdered by some wolf. Anyways my verdict is that this game has a good start and hopefully the devs will follow through. 10/10 would get wolf♥♥♥♥♥♥♥again

content:

Early Access Review
								Stay away from the schol if you don't have a weapon, unless  your life aspirations are to become wolf food, and expect to have a slow and painful death from dehydration because besides living in a snowy wonderland with lakes all around, it is near impossible to find a sustainable water supply. I need more Juice dammit! other than that the game is great fun for the price, I managed to find a shotgun and enough ammunation to deplete the Russian population. The game is simple to learn and a good fun if you can find someone who doesn't whisper sweet nothings into your ear as you loot an abandonded building together, I must also say this game is very tense when you are caught in a gun fight with someone, you don't alway know where they are and must track them via their footsteps or gunshots (You can actually see them it's just easy to lose sight of them) my best moment so far has been dispatching some poor bloke with one swift axe swipe and watching his corpse become a pretzel

								Found a house, went inside and encountered a fully kitted man.  Stared down the barrel of his shotgun.  He kept his sights on me for 20 seconds then let me go. 								I love this game, and for $5 it couldn't be a better price. Don't let the silly name fool you, this is a much more playable game than most of the current survival games. content:
Posted: June 13, 2015
Early Access Review
								A few things picked up:Axes (you need them to get wood to build a fire) can be found in lockers and the "very small" bottom drawers of wardrobes.If you hear a wolf/dog close, yes it is hunting you.The Fly Eastern Airplane crash site has a secret base under it. Looks like you need "at least" gasoline to get the elevator running.Churches appear to be good places to find ammo (go figure)pick a server with the time after 6/7hr for daylight.Don't go to the MARSH you might get stuck there with the "Black screen" of death.If you get the black screen of death where it does not load the next map, exit, get back in (because you can not see your menu to do the following), then suicide, wait the 1 min, do not respawn but press Alt-F4, and then close the game. When you restart you'll be in the prison but at least you wont' be trapped anymore. (got this hint from " [m]`project" https://steamcommunity.com/app/351290/discussions/0/618463738400698470/When you switch maps, and you see two guys standing in front of you with guns. Shoot them. They are shooting newbies to the game as they move from one map to the next and taking their stuff. Real jerks.Are there yet any maps of the world showing the location of sites?

content:
Posted: June 14, 2015
Early Access Review
								As someone who plays DayZ and recently started playing H1Z1, I don't know if this game is worth $5.  I almost died of thirst during the first playthrough with nothing to drink in sight.  I had acquired tons of food, but nothing to drink.  All the controls mentioned when you first start the game aren't all the controls, but you wouldn't know that.  No way to check the controls once you already start the game from what I could tell.  I then played through again and got stuck on top of a rail in a train depot or some building and had to suicide.So, I tried a 3rd time and my character kept respawning in random locations and there was no way I could manage to play properly.  This game has some potentional, but needs some serious bug fixes.  Until then, I cannot recommend this game.  Even at $5.  Bummer!P.S. I understand this is an early access game, but this pales in comparison to other early access games I've played.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 23, 2015
Early Access Review
								I was freezing to death, desperately searching a cabin for anything to help me warm up. All of a sudden two voices came over my walkie-talkie, speaking a language I don't understand. I was in no condition to fight them, and if I fled that would give away my position. So, I took the only other option available. I ran out of the cabin and went prone in the bushes, my pistol out and ready. My eyes and ears were open wide. They continued to talk. I was sweating. I heard footsteps from within the cabin, two distinct sets. They were close. I couldn't see through the brush which concealed me. After what felt like an agonizing eternity passed. The voices stopped. I had no way of knowing if they were gone, or had simply ceased talking. I bolted, running through the woods to get away. A few minutes later I died of hypothermia like a true Russian. 10/10 would hide again.

It'd be nice if animals stopped chasing you at some point. Once I have a ton of dogs chasing me, I just give up and let them kill me.-Character Customization? What Character Customization? I understand it's an upcoming feature, but don't advertise the feature till it's available.-This is just personal, but the models and animations are derpy like hell, but I don't hold it against ya guys, at least you're trying and we're not playing as potatoe people.-Each map is just too empty... I mea this once school place, it's just a school, a gas station, and a couple buildings, that's it. It makes it very hard to gather supplies.-Why can't I beat the crap out of people with my fists? I'm surprised the most common form of combat wasn't included.-Why can I only climb some ladders? Some ladders are climbable, but others aren't.-A pause mention would be nice so you can adjust stuff like volume. Some people don't play gams at top volume.-Some sound effects are super cheesy, like the eating sound, but it's just a personal thing.-Alot of useless buildings, like that train stations, there were too many decorative buildings, in a survival game you'd think that would be the perfect place to check. Nope. No Working doors.And now some things that I think would be nice to add...-It'd be nice to combine all the maps so there's no cut off from the adventure.-Maybe set it to where someone can host a game and handle more than 40 people-Female models would be nice, being a female I'd like to play as my gender.-More buildings would be nice as well.-Letting me take of clothes, I like runnin around like a mad man while requesting for hugs-It'd be nice to store weapons in your inventory as well, just let certain weapons take up more slots or something.-For people would capable of handling better graphics, it'd be nice to have an option to add more grass n'stuff, some places felt /too/ empty and simple addition of plants could fix that.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 29, 2015
Early Access Review
								Its interesting, Ill give it that. +The game appears to have client side loot-spawns, as in two people do not see the same loot unless they drop it personally from their inventory. This keeps loot fresh and relatively plentiful, which is a very interesting concept in a game such as this. +There appears to be one master server which houses individual hives in control of the separate territories, which in turn keeps latency and Dsync very low. Another interesting concept for sure.+Already plenty of variety in the loot and available weapons+Weapons feel and sound solid.-If you start the game without looking at the controls on the launcher first, you are going to have a bad time.-Game seems to be strictly PvP, which isnt necessarily a bad thing, just very frustrating sometimes. -Voice chat key is in an odd place, which if you didnt follow step 1, you will have a very bad time. (Its Z, but can be remapped)-/+ There is no player list, and there are no player names above players. This is amazing if you want to play by yourself or if you and your friends are seasoned veterans, but if you are new to this kind of game, finding friends will be frustrating. "Is that you? No." "Is THIS you? No."Overall for a game this new and still in early access, Ill give it an 8/10. Very entertaining, and it shows a lot of promise. Im kind of excited to see where the game goes.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 9, 2015
Early Access Review
								This genre is over-used. But this game is a great game to play with friends. It should be supported until it is fully created. At first, I thought this would be a zombie survival sandbox game, and that's why I tried it out. Turns out this was different, a virus infection without the zombies. Its very challenging, and this is a game that every survival fan should play. Although, there comes the annoying part, temperature. That is a very horrible add-on to the game, but due to solutions about the temperature, this game is just fine. A massive array of weapons, from the classic Axe, up to the American M4. A very big map to explore, from watery areas up to wildlife territories. The vehicles are just not right. You have to guess what should work with it. Also, there is no HUD, which is bad. No crafting recipes to be seen, unless for a few items that are pretty obvious. But for the overall, this game is a challenging game and a good one, too. So I probably recommend it to other players out there.

								Stay away from the schol if you don't have a weapon, unless  your life aspirations are to become wolf food, and expect to have a slow and painful death from dehydration because besides living in a snowy wonderland with lakes all around, it is near impossible to find a sustainable water supply. I need more Juice dammit! other than that the game is great fun for the price, I managed to find a shotgun and enough ammunation to deplete the Russian population. The game is simple to learn and a good fun if you can find someone who doesn't whisper sweet nothings into your ear as you loot an abandonded building together, I must also say this game is very tense when you are caught in a gun fight with someone, you don't alway know where they are and must track them via their footsteps or gunshots (You can actually see them it's just easy to lose sight of them) my best moment so far has been dispatching some poor bloke with one swift axe swipe and watching his corpse become a pretzel

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 30, 2015
Early Access Review
								These are first impressions so first of all this game is fun but it is not perfect. it is not a big game like DayZ Rust Or H1Z1 But It Is Simplistic And Fun So im just gonna say that for a 5 dollar survival game this game is really fun and im just gonna list the flaws here so lets go!1. Players random kill you every time they see you - i wish there was some kind of a group system (and a chat system) just so i could work with a group of players without having to worry about killing them or them killing me 2 . You spawn with no weapon! i saw footage from this game when it came out and everyone spawned with baseball bats but now we spawn with nothing which can be frustrating as hell because it takes hours to find weapons 3 . Usually what im about to say is good but in this game stuff spawns too rarely which makes it impossible to progressi feel they should make it so you can find certain types of weapons just by looking around for a few minutes but others will be almost impossible to find4 . when you press play you just join a random server , no server selection5 . No Options menu , we really need an options menu to rebind keys figure out which keys to what? and this needs to be fixed now suggestion time!!!because this is an early access game here are a few suggestions for it1 . A Fun Mode where stuff spawns frequently (guns cars heli's ETC) and a hardcore mode where finding stuff is almost impossible2 . a new map! this map although big is just nothing special but i can live with it3 . Add instructions , most of the time when playing i had no idea what i was doing!4 . please add Over powered military vehicles that are SUPER RARE and SUPER AWESOME but consume ALLOT of fuel5 . P-V-E (Player VS Enviornment) if you add P-V-E Servers i will play this game way more!!!6 . don't stop updating the game! since this is in early access you should update it more frequentlyso thats all this is by no means a bad game but if you really want a good survival game go buy DayZ Or Rust but if you want a diffrent kind of a survival game try this out!

content:
Posted: May 3, 2015
Early Access Review
								           So far I've only played this game for 2 hrs, but it was definitly one of the most intresting expirences I've had. First I spawn shirtless like any normal russian would (right?) near some shack, so I seach around until a dog scares the sh*t out of me and I run for about five minutes until I meet my first fellow player. He was dressed in green and armed with a shotgun so I decide to stay back and watch due to me being KOS'ed countless times in other games like it, he leaves and I find an ugly blue sweater, my first loot item and it probably saved others from being stabbed by my undoubtly pointy nips. It's been about an hour and I also just found a 357 and 5 bullets for it too, a few minutes later a innocent looking shirtless man just charges at me with an axe and I nervously spray bullets all over the place and lucky he gets hit by one or two and it kills him. So, as I strut off like a bad*ss Clint Eastwood I hear barking it's about 5 wolves coming for me I some how manage to slay all of them with an axe and limp away, I hide in a factory building and just as I turn around another corner to see one more I get bit and die. I'm not angry in fact I'm almost in tears from laughter that I survived off of luck for so long survived a godamn axe attack! Just to be murdered by some wolf. Anyways my verdict is that this game has a good start and hopefully the devs will follow through. 10/10 would get wolf♥♥♥♥♥♥♥again

content:
Posted: May 13, 2015
Early Access Review
								If you're into games like DayZ and Rust but not sure your computer can handle them, this is the game for you. At $5 you really can't beat this. Finding the correct ammo for your gun can be challenging, and melee weapons seem inordinately sparse, but the more you learn the map the better you'll be at finding loot. Pretty funny to watch people's ragdolls flail wildly after taking a magnum slug to the head.$5/10

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 30, 2015
Early Access Review
								These are first impressions so first of all this game is fun but it is not perfect. it is not a big game like DayZ Rust Or H1Z1 But It Is Simplistic And Fun So im just gonna say that for a 5 dollar survival game this game is really fun and im just gonna list the flaws here so lets go!1. Players random kill you every time they see you - i wish there was some kind of a group system (and a chat system) just so i could work with a group of players without having to worry about killing them or them killing me 2 . You spawn with no weapon! i saw footage from this game when it came out and everyone spawned with baseball bats but now we spawn with nothing which can be frustrating as hell because it takes hours to find weapons 3 . Usually what im about to say is good but in this game stuff spawns too rarely which makes it impossible to progressi feel they should make it so you can find certain types of weapons just by looking around for a few minutes but others will be almost impossible to find4 . when you press play you just join a random server , no server selection5 . No Options menu , we really need an options menu to rebind keys figure out which keys to what? and this needs to be fixed now suggestion time!!!because this is an early access game here are a few suggestions for it1 . A Fun Mode where stuff spawns frequently (guns cars heli's ETC) and a hardcore mode where finding stuff is almost impossible2 . a new map! this map although big is just nothing special but i can live with it3 . Add instructions , most of the time when playing i had no idea what i was doing!4 . please add Over powered military vehicles that are SUPER RARE and SUPER AWESOME but consume ALLOT of fuel5 . P-V-E (Player VS Enviornment) if you add P-V-E Servers i will play this game way more!!!6 . don't stop updating the game! since this is in early access you should update it more frequentlyso thats all this is by no means a bad game but if you really want a good survival game go buy DayZ Or Rust but if you want a diffrent kind of a survival game try this out!

Early Access Review
								This game is awesome to play. The only downside with the new update is that you can't ever play by yourself. If I could recommend any improvements the following would be my recommendations. 1. searching for a specific server would be nice for playing with friends 2. creating servers was nice, you could play by yourself and didn't have to worry about other players 3. spawning in with nothing makes it very hard to survive from dogs. All in all I know this game is a work in progress and nothing is final yet, but playing with friends can be very hard to do and playing by yourself is even harder. Do I recommend this game? Yes, I for sure do. Like I said I know its a work in progress and I'm happy to play the game.

content:
Posted: May 6, 2015
Early Access Review
								For 5 bucks, it's a good buy. I've played about an hour with some friends, and if I never play again, I believe I got my monies worth. It seemed really easy to find both of my friends when starting. Not sure if this was luck, or there's only a few new user spawn points, but we all started just a few blocks from each other.The game is difficult to get started in, as food doesn't seem very bountiful and you starve fairly quickly. It's basically a poormans DayZ. Should you get it? Yes, though remember: It's only 5 bucks, and you get what you pay for.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 24, 2015
Early Access Review
								This has to be the best £4 I have ever spent I have had loads of fun with this game.Graphics and animations are not the best but the game runs at a solid 60 FPS , the sound quality is brilliant and adds to the tense atmosphere of the game.This is not a PVE game and has not got PVE content this is a brutal PVP game where you will get KOS when you spawn , 90% of people will kill you.First day on the game I watched two fresh spawns brutally murdered by a scary russian and his friend armed to the teeth , I cowered behind a door clumped him on the back of his head , killed his mate and went on a rampage and then I was off.This game also has elevator music in lifts how good is that?So for a cheap £4 quick fun deathmatch because essentially base building and PVE content is not in then this is the game for you. If you cry when killed or want to hold hands with otehr survivors this is not for you.This is a tense gritty brutal murder simulator in Russia filled with Russians but its greatPlease view my you tube channel slightlymad79 there are 2 lengthy firstplay videos.

content:
Posted: April 24, 2015
Early Access Review
								In the beginning it was quite difficult, as there is no tutorial. I would recommend this guide to help you: http://steamcommunity.com/app/351290/guides/#scrollTop=0After some games, I got the hang of it. You need to loot a lot of houses, and try to build up a stack of food and drinks. An Axe is really important to get wood, and wood can be used for a lot of things. You need also a fair amount of luck with spawning, and the people in the server. If you spawn in the wrong place or meet people who kill you instantly, try another server.I would definitly recommend this game, as it is only 5 euro and it is quite some fun to play it! I will try and play it even more and probably will write another review after I know more of the game.

content:
Posted: May 15, 2015
Early Access Review
								Don't buy at this stage unless its under $10.00 , whilst fun it feels unfinished and unbalanced, however given this is early build its understandable.Pros :- Mostly complete game- Weapons are as expected in real life ( no head shot no damage RNG BS ) - Controls are fairly easy to use - Somewhat fun Cons : - You start the game unarmed, and you don't know how to punch or kick- Due to the above advanced players will camp your spawn points, as its safer to kill you than other well setup players- Nothing is explained before starting the game - Very easy to die of thirst, except its not logical, see empty bottles lying around, can you refill it ? , nope, drink a plastic bottle of water and the bottle vanishes- My system is fine , but it could chug on some machines- Not sure if everyone has this but my game had missing options from start menuMy review could change out of early testing , but at this stage stay away unless your wanting to put up with a fair amount of spawn killing and no real objective other than " collect crap kill players "

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: September 5, 2015
Early Access Review
								I am going to base this review  on the price of the game vs. its current state.  I bought the game during a sale for less then $5. This is the price of a Venti Latte at my local starbucks so i didnt expect much.  My first few attempts at SPN were the short-lived Beta version.  I will keep this review secluded to the current Alpha version of the game.Pros: - open feel to game- lack of UI (adding to sense of realism)- No zombies (I have been an avid player of Dayz mod since a month of it's release, avid 7D2D player etc.. enough zeds!)- price point when on sale- general concept and gameplay of what people are looking for in a survival game- PvP was (in general) a lot of funCons:- lack of ability to turn head independent of body/movement- felt very limited in my abilities (crafting etc...)-  server list needs work- when you die you should spawn in the beg. area instead of current area. It should take longer then a minute or two to recover your body !! No fun to kill someone who can respawn and get back to there corpse before you can finish looting it....- graphics popping in and outOverviewThe game need A LOT of work, but the potential , framework is there. If you can pick it up for $5 it is well worth it.  The guys making the game are also giving it away for free in alpha, beta. Check the website! :D

								Found a house, went inside and encountered a fully kitted man.  Stared down the barrel of his shotgun.  He kept his sights on me for 20 seconds then let me go.  Found a shotgun, followed him outside and shot him.  No Russian.Honestly though, this game is pretty great.  I was able to find a shotgun, backpack, pistol and plenty of ammo, as well as some food within 20 minutes, whereas in Dayz or H1Z1, the chances of having all of those in 20 minutes are slim to none. 								For 5 bucks, it's a good buy. I've played about an hour with some friends, and if I never play again, I believe I got my monies worth. It seemed really easy to find both of my friends when starting. Not sure if this was luck, or there's only a few new user spawn points, but we all started just a few blocks from each other.The game is difficult to get started in, as food doesn't seem very bountiful and you starve fairly quickly. It's basically a poormans DayZ. Should you get it? Yes, though remember: It's only 5 bucks, and you get what you pay for.

								Well,First time loading:Everything loaded I looked for a server there was none so I clicked create. Spent 10 minutes staring at a loading screen before I alt+f4Second time loading:This one went swimminglyTHE MAIN MENU DIDNT LOADAt this point I could tell it was a quality game and I was ready to enjoy the quality in the gameplay shown in the invisible main menu! Third through to fith time loading:Same as the 2nd timeSix'th:Praise the lord the main menu actually opened!!!! Can you believe it? I know right! I mean I thought I was crazy expecting a game to have a working main menu but it actually happene........ wait a minuteThe buttons dont work! Well I say the buttons dont work The, Play, Servers and help buttons didnt work. But Ironicly the quit button did! So Game devs done a great job at making a working quick button! Overall when I did get in-game like 3 months ago was kind of taky but decent and it appears to have gotton worse over time since I just spent the last 15 minutes of my life trying to get a functional main menu....11/10 would buy game with no main menu again

								Love the game, I have been waiting for this to be on steam. Good game. So far so good, but the problem is I can't seem to get firewood. I know I have played the Facebook version of this but how the hell would you keep your self warm? Need more spawns of firewood and meds in med boxes just like in game. Theres also a tower somewhere in Factory map that when you climb to the top and see bunch of stuffs you want but when you try to get it, you can't cuz theres no way of getting there, I tried once but fell to my death and lost all of my stuff.Other than that its cool. Weapons and durabilities seems a bit unfair but its survival right? but where the hell would I find a repairing tool and an oil? I know I found an oil once but that was at Army map, but teh next game its just hard to find it.Oh this game is very very good as far as I know the only way to find a wood for fire is to chop trees down with an axe, very clever, this game is really talking how to really survive in a postapocalyptic era. Hopefully in the next patch is some game settings were in you can change your control settings cuz I have a hard time with the crouch in left Ctrl when I press twice I believe it goes prone, One more thing is the AI dogs, I HATE THEM! They know how to get inside a house and sometimes they just spawn or teleport behind you sometimes theres a bug where in they like suck into the groudn then appear in front of you. Cuz finding those is absolutely crazy and time wasting cuz whenever someone kills you and on your next respawn you go half naked. content:

Early Access Review
								1. Find house.2. Lay low to not make noise in case anyone is around.3. Player comes out the door with an axe as he heard some of my footsteps.4. I quickly stand up point the gun at him, and say "Back off!"5. I run inside the house looting everything I can.6. He tries to get close and I say "Back off or I'll shoot!"7. I run out the house, go up to him, pull the trigger. No Bullets.8. Run away.I knew I had no bullets, yet it worked beautifully! in-game voice chat is excellent!Even though it's in Alpha, the optimization is really admirable. You've got a lot to do, and the pressure between players is pretty realistic with this setting. Survival: PostApocalypse Now can really become something great if the developers continue to put the time and dedication they have so far, and listen to the community!

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 22, 2016
Early Access Review
								I wish there was a mixed button but there isn't soo...I started playin' survival back in 2015 with my best friend the game was available on facebook, you could buy kits that would vary from 0,20€  to 2€ wich is pretty much the same in dollars.The game was really fun, it was more focused on combat and pvp pretty much with no survival aspect, it had alot a hackers but they weren't a big threat. there were some bugs here and there but nothing special. And about the microtransactions, it was really easy to find weapons so the players that spent money in the game wouldn't have advantages. It's 2016, I have more than a 1000 hours in the game.Finnaly the steam version launched and we didn't really care.Soem onths later we decided to go to steam and see what's new about the steam version we looked at the community hub and there was a bunch of cool vehicles and etc, and we thought that the game was really cool so we decided to buy it.First day of playing the game, me and my friend took 1 hour and 30 minutes to find each other, then another hour goes by and we find one player who had a shotgun, we tried to communicate with him and he started shooting us, he missed all the shots and i shot him one time in the head i killed him, pretty use kill, i was already used to shooting in survival.So now i have 13hours of gameplay and i gotta say,the game has a LOT of potential but, right there's alot of bugs and gamebreaking problems, almost nobody playing and I  can understand why.So i recommend you to play the facebook version instead, you'll have alot more fun.If you have 5 bux to spare and want to support the devs it's your choice.I keep looking forward to this game, and i hope this review helps.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 26, 2015
Early Access Review
								This is a really awesome game, you'd expect it to be just like every other game (Ex, DayZ, Rust, H1Z1), but it's not! I think that this game has an different feel to it. With PvP and PvE, things never get boring! Crafting is easy, although finding the right items can sometimes be difficult and there are a lot of nice players!Why should you buy this game?- It's $5 and it will run on most rigs!- It's Early Access! If you want to be apart of something, small early access games like this are really fun! You can follow the development, let devs know about bugs, and maybe give them some tips!- It doesn't take long to find gear or other players and the map is still pretty big!Why wouldn't you want to buy this game?- It's Early Access . . .  There are going to be quite a few bugs, not everyone is going to be playing it, and it's basic.- Some people will be total♥♥♥♥♥♥♥and shoot you not long after you spawn, even if you don't have gear.- If you don't have patients, this game will suck for you. You may go through a life or two before you get enough gear and live for awhile because it is a little complicated to make a fire.If you want to read up on a short, awesome guide while the game downloads, click hereHELLFIRE BATTALION!!

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 26, 2015
Early Access Review
								Survival:PAN as of right now in early access is MUCH more stable than all of the other hardcore survival games on release, and is also 4 times cheaper than the other games... However I do not know if the price is going to increase in the future.  Lets start with what I think the Pros arePros-Very Stable, servers have 0 lag or Dsync-EXTREMELY Optimized.... If you play on a lower end machine, Do not worry. Turn the graphics and resolution down and you're good to go-Very fun PvP; As of now the PvP is very Rustesq. Kills are very meaty and rewarding, and the bombat is generally fun to partake in-RP; As of 2/26/15 the game has little unreasonable kos...  Most players enjoy to RP atm and if there is combat, it is for a reason-Weapons;  Right now literally all of the weapons you find are: Shotguns, Hammers, and the 3 main pistols... In combat, body shots can rake up to 3 shots to kill, So when you are shot at, it is quite easy to return fire and not die instantly without a chance to fight back-Looks Great!; For this game to run so smooth and cost so little, the devs have put so much work into making it look decent-CRAFTING <3; A hardcore survival game in early access that has stable crafting and NO lag at the same time! HOLY♥♥♥♥♥♥br>Now, on to the cons- Very little explanation when you start the game,  There is no guidance in the beginning or anything telling you the craft system or how to do things... And as of now there is no wiki for the game :(-Crappy UI; The UI is honestly the biggest downfall of the game... The inventory system is clunky as ♥♥♥♥, and to a new player... You don't know what going on, Your equipped items don't show up in your inventory, there is no ammo indication(so you never no how much ammo you ave unless your'e using the double barrel or one of the revolvers). Aswell as when your'e critically wounded you do not know if you are going to have the bleed effect or not until your screen starts blinking-Loot; Lot spawning is not really that great, In the trailers it shows awesome assault rifle battles, but in the real game, you're lucky to find ammo for you pistol... I've never even seen a player with an AR, the best I have seen is the Mosin.  A lot of the times you will also die of dehydration because you find ♥♥♥♥ tons of food and no ♥♥♥♥ing water... And gas cans are the rarest ♥♥♥♥ing thing in the game I swear, like i just wanna drive my ♥♥♥♥ing tractor with my bros god damnit-♥♥♥♥ING WOLVES, THE GOD DAMN WOLVES ARE SO ♥♥♥♥ING ANNOYING, THIS IS NOT THE LONG DARK, GTFO WOLVES.All in All this game is one of the most solid Early Access games i have ever played aside from KSP. So sell your AK redline and buy this game before it rises in price because the game is a diamond in the like a baby in the trash

content:

Early Access Review
								This Game is not the most beautiful out there but oh my Glow Cloud (all hail) is it fun!I have been on a number of adventures in the short time that i played...most ending in a combination of freezing to death and/or dog attacks.The community is fantastic, I met this one guy who called himself baldy. we had no weapons so we where on a search we walked a fairly large distance talking and gathering food in the hope of some warm clothes and guns.  All was well until we reached an abandoned school and where chased by a dog and got separated and didn't see him again. about 10 mins later i found some weapons but realised i was freezing to death. Suddenly the game turned into a race against the clock to start a campfire before i died. I cut a tree down and got some wood that i couldn't light. Apparently i needed gasoline... i spent the next 10-15 mins struggling to find gas opening every locker in hoppes of finding some. it got to the point where i was almost dead. i heard a barking behind me and a dog ran through the door and killed me with one bite.My story isn't even the best yet to come. I know by what i've experienced thus far that i have so much more to explore.only downside is the inventory is tough to get used to. im never sure how certain things are supposed to work together, but all in all this game has HOURS of intense survival that still awaits me and hopefully any other pontential buyer.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 25, 2015
Early Access Review
								So first off as of today I have 15 hours playing this game.This game is keeping with the tradition of the genre by being early access alpha. It is 5 us dollars on steam (cheapest of the two well known DayZSA and H1Z1). It has a few glitches like seeing people in the prone animation when they are sprinting and dogs running through walls. These are the only major glitches I've found in the game. This game runs on full graphics settings at 60fps no problem for a mid-range PC. It has quite a few different guns where you have to load the correct ammo into the correct mag. The graphics are okay, and the first person animations are alright. The map is a linear map starting in the school and goes toward the factory. The map is split into zones that you can see if you find a map in game. Simply run to the edge and you will load into the next zone. This game has underground bunkers and several different cars to repair as well as a helicopter. There is a food/drink system to stay alive. There is a health system and a constant fear of freezing to death which seems to only be combated by a fire. Overall the amount of loot you'll find versus what you need to stay alive is well balance. You'll always need something to stay alive. You'll find yourself fighting the cold, other players, and dogs to stay alive while you explore the different zones and get geared up.This game has a lot of potential if it gets support and the dev's keep working hard. In its current state its worth the 5 dollars and its probably only going to get better.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: October 7, 2015
Early Access Review
								Survival: Postapocalypse Now is an early acces Alpha FPS survival game, it has no campaign but a funny, adventurous and sometimes exciting multiplayer-survaval game mode. Although it costs us a little, as far as I'm concerned, it is not too much for the content of the game. In addition to in-game features, sometimes players will have to face challenges from the environment itself and other players, prudence will be your key and best friend to survive with.In this game, you will find more developped materials, resources and weapons by moving further and further away, you can still stay where you were when you have spawned, but my suggestion will be to advance, get fully equipped and packed with enough food and other raw materials. In this game, you can even make a helicopter fly or driving cars and jeeps.I also strongly recommend you to play this game with friends, it will be really funny and interesting to play with more players than just alone. It will be much easier to survive since you find different materials in different places, for example: you might find an AK-47 on a table while your teamnate can see just a bottle of water on the same table. You will get more chance to find rare items and will find it easier to survive. You can also kill the players then grab their items, which is more easily than gather them slowly but surely.P.S: there are no zombies in this game, so if you get into a dark area you don't need to be afraid.^^Positive remarks+ multiplayer mode+ very interesting and funny to play with friends+ difficulty improved each time you go towards a new map+ challenging to survive with some enemy players+ wide range of weapons and resources+ only 2 kinds of animals will attack you: wolves(dogs?) and bears+ new ways to survive ( cooking )+ vehicles + dynamite+ quick updates from the GM+ different features and functions on clothesNegative remarks- sometimes severe bugs will occur (ex: you spawn on the sky and die by falling on the ground)- animals (that are offensive) spawn always at the same place, less challenging- only a few maps to discover- hackers- temperature issues for survival decreases a little bit too quickly- at first, players spawn in a prison and can die right away if you don't get out quickly enough, especially to beginners- weapon switching system is a bit strange

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 21, 2015
Early Access Review
								With no more time than I have in it so far, I would have to say it is a pretty good game. Many people are complaining that it is not well thought out, and so on, but it is clearly an alpha. They are actively working on it, with two updates being posted within the last two days. I was looking for a true survival game that encouraged caution and resourcefulness, so if you are looking for a game that is about taking your time, instead of running headfirst into everything and expecting everything you need to be handed to you, this might be it. The players are the biggest danger, so unless you are prepared to die and lose everything you have, don't go looking for other players until you are armed.   If you play it, you will inevitably run from wolves because you have no weapons to defend yourselves (picking up a 2x4 does make sense, if you could...) and crouching in corners, waiting for groups to go by without noticing you.             I would like to see foraging for food, and many other things that others have mentioned as well. For instance, there are people out there that do not need to douse their wood in gasoline to start a  fire, so maybe some sort of survival skill system would pan out well with the game, without breaking the gameplay. I don't necessarily dislike any aspect of the game (aside from wolves that walk through closed doors), but am eager to see the forthcoming improvements.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: May 15, 2015
Early Access Review
								One of the best survival games out there! If you're trying to decide whether to buy this game, let me tell you, it's definitely worth the $5. I also bought 2 copies for my friends and it's our new favorite game to play together. When we first logged on, I thought this game was going to be a waste of money, but then we began to understand the game better and we figured out that there's a lot more to this game than you think. We play it all the time now and we're still new players in it, but it's a good game.We were always stuck in the first area where we always spawned and couldn't figure out what to do next, but now I've memorized the areas and maps and we're moving up. There's a lot of stuff in this game, but I know you're wondering where the zombies are at...well, there are no zombies! But that's a good thing with this game. It makes it a better and more realistic game without zombies, and gives you more time to focus on not getting killed by other players or wolves!I really recommend this game and if you have the money, please buy it and support these great developers.

								Well, where to start with this game. If this had been full price, this game would not have been purchased. It feels good at first,  you start off in a jail cell, atmosphere is very dark	, along with the lighting in the game. it gives off a horror game feel, but is a survivial game. i guess getting ***** by bears is pretty scary since finding the weapons to fight it are hard to do, then killing the thing if you're lucky only getting one in the area, have fun with that. the bears are waaaaaaay too overpowered in my honest opinion. once you play the game for a bit you get the hang of it, oh wait, youre thirsty? pfft, have a gander at locating some water and dealing with the annoying "im thirsty" qoutes. We get it! there are no women in the game! jokes aside it really is annoying to hear the thirst speeches every minute.   i would up vote the game but there really is no real reason to.  the thing i liked about the game was the jail cell.  but that got taken away from me when you leave it. if you really dont care about your money, get it for you and a friend and play it for two hours and then ask each other if valve can refund time. Why? They made playable "beta" version which I played for about 20 hours. But then they probably thought "Hey, lets make new version of this game with better graphics and other improvements". Old Survival - 6+/10New alpha - f****g 3/10

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: September 6, 2015
Early Access Review
								2016 full review edit / change to not recommended...: I can't recommend this game anymore. It's very glitchy, no one plays anymore (30 people across multiple servers, if that.) and the devs have abandoned the game to work on their next project. Postapocalypse Now: War. Here's just a few glitches / annoyances.Animals (bears, wolves) spotting you from half way across the map.Animals never ceasing to stop chasing you. If you somehow break their pathing (climb on a ladder, close a door) they will sit there and wait for you forever.Weapons are always unloaded. No ammo, no clips or magazines, nothing. Finding guns is arguable the most common. Finding literally anything useful is a test of patience.You're constantly freezing to death. To stay warm you need an axe to cut down a tree and get wood, fuel to soak the wood and a lighter to burn it. That wouldn't be so bad if you weren't CONSTANTLY. FREEZING. TO DEATH.You start out at about 37 or so degrees celcius. Celcius. That's 98.6 degrees fahrenheit.You will freeze to death and die at about 25 celcius. THAT'S  77 DEGREES FAHRENHEIT. YOU DIE AT ROOM TEMPERATURE. IN THE MIDDLE OF SIBERIA. NAKED.This upsets me the most, because food and water are managable, but god help you if you don't find the tools for a fire. R.I.P. Dmitry. Got slightly too cool and died.You're completely defenseless most of the time. You find a gun? Good for you, it will never have ammo and good luck finding any. Pray you find a melee weapon.Their newest "alpha" version of the game is literally an unplayable mess, it was somehow more broken than their older version. Like, broken to the point where your mouse didn't work when you tried to play it.It had a lot of squandered potential, and it was actually a lot of fun when hundreds of people played, devs were still working on the game and you had someone to play with despite it being glitchy. The last "update" was in March, with the ungodly terrible alpha update.Don't buy this game, it doesn't seem to be getting any better from here.

content:
Posted: February 7, 2016
Early Access Review
								This game needs a lot of improvement. But, It does have some Pros.Pros:Pretty good way of actually starting your survival. (Trying to escape the prison you woke up in)Pretty cheap survival game.Somewhat realistic.Weather can actually kill you.No hackers. (YET)Now... lets go to the cons.Cons:Grahpics are a little bad.You can't even change grahpic settings nor any settings.No way of typing so people without mics can really communicate.Teleports. (You can walk to a certain area and get teleported to another part of a map, I think thats a little annoying, making the map bigger to make that all fit would be good and much better)Crafting is a little annoying to use.Wolves and bears spawn the exact same place everytime.You spawn with your stuff from another server.No way to make your own server.Crouching makes you go through this procces; Crouch then Prone then stand back up. You can just go back to standing.You can fall from 2 feet and get injured.The community is already going bad. (People are just killing on sight and people are just roasting each other)Base building is really that good. (People are just building in already generated buildings and they claim it as their own)The only people I ever saw playing this game were Russians. You already know what Russians do in CS:GO.... Don't need to explain.If you want to play a cheap survival game when you are bored this is the game. I don't recommend putting hours and hours of gameplay on this because this game isn't finished and you'll probably die by falling or a Russian on the server killing you.
